ctx: intros l l' i Hneq Hpref Hsorted Hcontl Hcontl'.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet * is not finished.

original: intros l l' i Hneq Hpref Hsorted Hcontl Hcontl'. unfold removeAfterIndex. induction l. - simpl. contradiction Hneq. reflexivity. - destruct (eIndex a <=? i) eqn:Heq. + simpl. destruct l'. * simpl in Hpref. contradiction Hpref. * simpl. apply removeAfterIndex_same_sufficient'; auto. -- apply prefix_sorted with (l:=l); auto. -- apply sorted_Permutation_eq with (l:=l); auto. -- intros e Hin. apply Hpref, Prefix_in with (x:=e) in Hin; auto. -- intros e Hin. apply Hpref, Prefix_In with (x:=e) in Hin; auto. + simpl. rewrite IHl; auto. * destruct l'. ++ simpl in Hpref. contradiction Hpref. ++ apply removeAfterIndex_same_sufficient'; auto. ** apply prefix_sorted with (l:=l); auto. ** apply sorted_Permutation_eq with (l:=l); auto. ** intros e Hin. apply Hpref, Prefix_in with (x:=e) in Hin; auto. ** intros e Hin. apply Hpref, Prefix_In with (x:=e) in Hin; auto.
